name: A storm is approaching
description:
A storm is approaching Multiple choices, multiple endings.

A storm is approaching and you have to keep yourself safe.
Every choice you make will completely change your path and your story.
Including its ending.

It's up to you to find the best one.

Remember: the right thing to do is not always the best thing to do.

Features:
-Realistic sound FXs;
-Atmospheric sound and music carefully engineered;
-Share the endings you achieve on twitter.


Official Discord
